data.name: Naked Story
data.detailed_description:
Latest Release


About the Game

If lose the match Strip on the street ! Streaking in the city !
This is a unique "Japanese Sugoroku" adventure game.

The basic rules are like the "Japanese Sugoroku" game.
Go ahead to the goal while playing a card game.
Winning a card game will reduce the heroine's [HP].
If [HP] decreases, it will be undressed accordingly.
For details, please refer to the manual or the official website.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Erroneously detect by security software.]


Because this product is an original program, security software may find false positives.
This product is simply a game and the program is safe, so please disregard such warnings.
Please add it to your security software's safe list if this poses a problem.


However, there are reports that illegal uploads outside of steam include programs unknown to the developers.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Trading card implementation!]



------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Localization complete!]


Translation of the text in the game into English has been completed!
I was translated by an USA translation company.
All conversations during the game are displayed in English.

If you have already bought it, you can upgrade it for free.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Characters are all adults.]


This is a fictional story. Everything does not really exist.
Characters are all adults.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[If an error occurs.]


Please install the [Japanese language pack].
[Settings] -> [Time & Language] -> [Region & Language] -> [Add a Language] -> [Japanese]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Character introduction.]

data.supported_languages:
Japanese*, English
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7 / Windows8 / Windows10 / Windows11
  • Processor: Intel Atom CPU Z3735F 1.33Ghz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1700 MB available space
